page.title: 06RECENT CHANGES
page.content: THERE HAVE BEEN MANY CHANGES IN THE SCHOOL LATELY.CLASS 5'S MOBILE WAS MOVED AND THEY HAD NEW STEPS.THE PLAYGROUND WAS SHORTENED SO THAT THE ROAD COULD BE WIDENED,AND A NEW NETBALL PITCH MARKED OUT ON THE PLAYGROUND.LAST YEARS CLASS 6 DUG OUT A FISHPOND AND MR.WOOTTEN LAID A LINING INSIDE AND LAID SOME PAVING STONES DOWN TO HOLD THE LINING IN PLACE.NOW WE HAVE GOT FISH AND PLANTS IN THERE.A SANDPIT WAS BUILT IN 1984 AND CLASS 1 ENJOY IT AND HAVE GREAT FUN IN IT.ALSO FOR CLASSES 1&2 A CLIMBING FRAME HAS BEEN PUT UP AND, THAT'S ANOTHER THING THEY ENJOY.THE HALL WAS PAINTED AND MRS.WOOTTEN ASKED PARENTS TO VOLUNTEER.
